articles.title: France and Germany lead downbeat EU response to US trade deal - BBC
articles.description: France describes it as a "submission", though there is relief in Europe that a trade war has been averted.
articles.content:
Emily Atkinson & Laura Gozzi
Leaders from Europe's two largest economies have led a chorus of gloomy reactions to the trade deal struck between EU chief Ursula von der Leyen and US President Don… [+3825 chars]
